data.title: Priyanka Karki to Receive Dadasaheb Phalke Award
meta_keywords: Best Online News portal from Nepal focusing on Political

data.text:
Nepali actress Priyanka Karki is set to add another feather to her cap as she is honored with the prestigious Dadasaheb Phalke Award for Best Actress Nepal. The announcement comes on the occasion of the 155th Dadasaheb Jayanti, marking a significant milestone in Karki’s illustrious career.

The Dadasaheb Phalke Film Foundation Awards, known for recognizing excellence in Indian cinema, has chosen Priyanka Karki for her outstanding contributions to the Nepali film industry. Renowned for her versatility as an actress, model, director, and writer, Karki has carved a niche for herself in the hearts of audiences both nationally and internationally.

With an impressive repertoire of films including “Nai Na Bhannu La,” “Fulbari,” “Chhakka Panja 3,” “Lily Bily,” and “Lootera,” among others, Priyanka Karki has consistently showcased her talent and dedication to the craft of acting.

The prestigious award ceremony is scheduled to take place on May 30 at 6 AM in the esteemed Mukesh Patel Auditorium, Vile Parle, Mumbai. This recognition not only celebrates Karki’s individual achievements but also highlights the growing prominence of Nepali cinema on the global stage.

Priyanka Karki’s upcoming honor is a testament to her relentless pursuit of excellence and her invaluable contribution to the entertainment industry.
